thread.title: American Tourister APP LITE The ultra light travel companion designed for tech savvy
thread.title_full: American Tourister APP LITE The ultra light travel companion designed for tech savvy | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: American Tourister APP LITE The ultra light travel companion designed for tech savvy
text:
(MENAFN Press) App Lite Oct. 12 2015 - PRLog -- UAE 2015In today''s world anyone who is not tech-savvy is considered obsolete. When technology has taken over our lives in such a manner is it not fair to have a travel companion which is also tech-savvy? To cater to this demand world-class luggage manufacturer American Tourister has designed its APPLITE range packing the right punch for today''s tech-loving traveler.APPLITE is a great fun luggage which is ultra-light and contemporary in the true sense of the term juxtaposing the best of design with the practicality and durability with high performance!Now available across the Middle East the American Tourister APPLITE collection of soft side luggage is so amazingly light that any traveler will not have to leave a thing behind! So pack all your latest tech gadgets thanks to this light weight range.Mr. Jai Krishnan - VP Samsonite Middle East at American Tourister says ''American Tourister''s APPLITE extends the perfect need-based functionalitya practical luggage solution that expands to ''big holiday'' volumes while remaining exceptionally light. Designed for the contemporary traveler APPLITE is light and strong at the same time highlighting the fun and colorful character of American Tourister with its colorful co-ordinate wheels neon splashes of colour on the exterior and intense bold colors internally.''The strong yet lightweight APPLITE comes with funky interior lining colors matching the accents on the top handle push button zip puller and 360 multidirectional spinner wheels and trims.American Tourister APPLITE suitcases offer stainless steel finish with neon branding and feature two front pocketsincluding padded tablet sleeve with only one padlock required to secure both fixed TSA combination lock for security soft easy grip side handle for easy carrying and expanders for extra capacity.The large 82cm suitcase expands to 125 liters one of the largest soft side bags available. What''s surprising is that this huge volume bag only weighs 3.5kg enabling the traveler to pack even more in! Equipped with four spinner wheels heaps of storage pockets for all your essentials APPLITE epitomizes light travel in true sense! --- End ---
